text:
Hi Jamie,

I am a HubSpot Specialist and HubSpot Certified Developer.

I am also a Bonus Prize Winner of the "HubSpot Theme Challenge 2021", I have developed this theme.
<https://devpost.com/software/twentyone-HubSpot-cms-theme>

Hello everyone!  I have a client seeking a *HubSpot Engineer on a short term, 2 month contract* (thru EOY) on W2.  The specific skillset needed is *prior experience with integrating Shopify into HubSpot.*  Must be based in U.S., fully remote, working EST hours.  Please message if interested.  Thank you!

I am a seasoned Web developer with 6 years of experience and a track record of building 9 successful applications. I have developed expertise in building dynamic user interfaces that deliver a smooth and immersive user experience.
I developed and customized HubSpot templates, modules, and landing pages as per client requirements, Integrated HubSpot with other third-party applications using APIs.
If you are looking for a web developer who is passionate, highly skilled , I would love to discuss with you.
Thank you.
sent you a message please check it,
